sf276:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Śrāvastī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍa’s monastery.

sf276:3.1: Then that deva, when the disk of the moon glowed intensely red, was scared, terrified, shocked and their hair stood on end.
